short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool helps with reducing manual labor and mail tasks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool will help you save money and time processing your letters. It's 100% free to install, and you can pay as you go—no more trips to the post office or subscriptions. This tool has built-in letter tracking, saves you 20% in cost, and a few other features you want to use!

❌ No subscriptions
✅ Free to download
✅ Pay as you go
✅ Faster mailing (Guaranteed delivery in 4-6 days)
✅ New Features (Make the receiver the sender)
✅ Better results than hand mailing! We've been able to get 9% better results than hand mail because of our special processing service level agreements 
✅ Built in letter tracking!
✅ 20% cheaper than the alternatives
